original_title: ดารัมซาล่า ความหวังแห่งศรัทธา
overview: Inspired by Phra Thep Pariyatsuthi - Abbot of Wat Phra Non Chaksiha, Singburi Province, with the aim of inserting Dharma in Buddhism through the media of the movie, which is a filming from real events in the Dhammayatra-Warn arrangement.
title: Dharamsala
